#summary Potential Integration Projects

= Useful Extensions to Consider =

===Visualization===
 * Network visualization: http://code.google.com/p/python-graph/w/list
 * Sophisticated network analysis: http://igraph.sourceforge.net/
 * Vector graphics support (requires numpy): http://matplotlib.sourceforge.net/
 * RNA-Seq isoform visualization (requires Matplotlib and PyML) : http://splicegrapher.sourceforge.net/
 * RNA-Seq quality control and visualization (requires GCC): http://code.google.com/p/ever-seq/
 * Expression cluster visualization: http://www.bioinformatics.ubc.ca/matrix2png/
 * Other: http://vermeulen.ca/python-graphics.html

===Data Analysis===
 * Exon expression extraction: http://code.google.com/p/bedtools/
 * Hierarchical and agglomerationexpressive clustering: http://docs.scipy.org/doc/scipy/reference/cluster.hierarchy.html
 * PCA and clustering: http://pyrorobotics.org/?page=PyroModuleAnalysis
 * RNA-Seq QC and visualization: http://code.google.com/p/ever-seq/
===Other===
 * Cross-platform R interface: http://www.webarray.org/softwares/PypeR/

note: Win32 and Win64 unofficial installers can be found here: http://www.lfd.uci.edu/~gohlke/pythonlibs/
